Extract Mediation Structure from lavaan Objects

Source: R/methods-extract-lavaan.R
extract_mediation_lavaan.Rd

Extract mediation structure from SEM models fitted with the lavaan package. Supports models fitted with sem(), cfa(), or lavaan().

Usage

extract_mediation_lavaan(
  object,
  treatment,
  mediator,
  outcome = NULL,
  standardized = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

object

A fitted lavaan object.

treatment

Character: name of the treatment variable.

mediator

Character: name of the mediator variable.

outcome

Character: name of the outcome variable. If NULL, the function attempts to detect it automatically.

standardized

Logical: whether to use standardized estimates. Default is FALSE.

...

Additional arguments (currently unused).

Value

A MediationExtract object.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
if (requireNamespace("lavaan", quietly = TRUE)) {
    library(lavaan)

    # Define model
    model <- "
    M ~ a*X
    Y ~ b*M + cp*X
  "

    # Simulate data
    X <- rnorm(100)
    M <- 0.5 * X + rnorm(100)
    Y <- 0.4 * M + 0.2 * X + rnorm(100)
    data <- data.frame(X = X, M = M, Y = Y)

    # Fit model
    fit <- sem(model, data = data)

    # Extract
    extract <- extract_mediation(fit, treatment = "X", mediator = "M")

    # Compute P_med
    pmed(extract)
}
} # }
